sidebar.step_0.title: üìú Siyakwemukela ku-SafetyHelp
sidebar.step_0.description: Hlola amathuluzi wethu apheleleko nezinto zokusebenzisa ukuthuthukisa ukuphepha nekambiso yezamaphilo emsebenzini endaweni yakho yokusebenzela.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Bewazi bona ukusebenzisa abathengisi abathembekileko nabaziphethe kuhle kunganciphisa iingozi emsebenzini ngokuqinisekisa bona umsebenzi wenziwa ngesikhathi nangezinga eliphezulu lokuphepha?
intro.title: Siyakwemukela ku-SafetyHelp
intro.description: Hlola amathuluzi wethu apheleleko nezinto zokusebenzisa ukuthuthukisa ukuphepha nekambiso yezamaphilo emsebenzini endaweni yakho yokusebenzela.
welcome.title: Siyakwemukela ku-SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Ipulatifomu yakho ethembekileko yezokuphepha nekambiso yezamaphilo emsebenzini (i-OHS) eSewula Afrika. Sinikela ngamathuluzi azenzakalelako, athuthukiswe yi-AI ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha nokuthotshelwa kwemithetho ezindaweni zokusebenzela, ezikolweni, emakerekeni, nemikhakheni engakahleleki. Joyina umphakathi wethu ukufikelela izinto zokusebenzisa, imisebenzi, nokusekelwa okwenzelwe iimfuno zakho.
why_choose.title: Kubayini Ukhetha i-SafetyHelp Ngekuthotshelwa kwe-OHS?
why_choose.content: I-SafetyHelp ngumlingani wakho othembekileko wokuthotshelwa kwezempilo nokuphepha emsebenzini eSewula Afrika. Ipulatifomu yethu inikela ngesethi epheleleko yamathuluzi enzelwe ukuhlangabezana neemfuno ezihlukileko zemikhakha efana nokwakha, imayini, nokukhiqiza. Kusukela ekwenzeni amarejista asemthethweni ukuya ekwenzeni ukuhlolwa kwengozi, i-SafetyHelp yenza kube lula iimfuneko eziyinkimbinkimbi ze-OHS ngama-wizard asebenziseka lula nokusekelwa ngesikhathi sangempela nge-chatbot yethu enamandla we-AI. Ngokusekelwa yimithetho yeSewula Afrika nemikhuba emihle, sinikela amandla emabhizinisini ukudala iindawo zokusebenzela eziphephileko ngokuqinisekisa ukuthotshelwa kwe-OHSA ne-COIDA. Joyina amakhulu wabasebenzi abathembela ku-SafetyHelp ukuvikela amaqembu wabo nokwenza lula iinkambiso zokuphepha.
legal_obligations.client.title: Imisebenzi Yomthengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Umthethonqubo Wezokwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela Ukuhlolwa Kwengozi Okuyisisekelo (i-BRA) okukhomba iingozi zephrojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Umthethonqubo Wezokwakha 5(1)(b): Nikela Ngehlathululo Yezempilo Nokuphepha echaza iimfuneko ezithile zephrojekthi.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Umthethonqubo Wezokwakha 5(1)(l): Yamukela IHlelo Lezempilo Nokuphepha Likakontraka ngaphambi kokuthoma komsebenzi.

legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Umthethonqubo Wezokwakha 7(1)(a): Thumela IHlelo Lezempilo Nokuphepha elisekelwe ehlathululweni yomthengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Umthethonqubo Wezokwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina Ifayela Lezempilo Nokuphepha esizeni nazo zoke iimfuneko ezidingekako.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Umthethonqubo Wezokwakha 9: Yenza Ukuhlolwa Kwengozi Nokuhlolwa Kwengozi Yokukhomba Ingozi (ama-HIRA) okukhethekileko emsebenzini.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Imisebenzi Yabachwepheshe be-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Umthethonqubo Wezokwakha 5(5): Ama-Ejenti (ama-PrCHSA) aphatha i-H&S egameni lomthengi, aqinisekise ukuthotshelwa.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Umthethonqubo Wezokwakha 8(5): Ama-Ofisiri (ama-CHSO) asiza abokontraka ekusebenziseni nasekutloleni amabhuku weenhlelo ze-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Imikhombandlela ye-SACPCMP: Kufuze ugcine iimfuneko zokurejista neze-CPD zesikhundla sobuchwepheshe.

resources.description: Udinga usizo lobuchwepheshe? Thintana nabachwepheshe abagunyaziweko ngeemfuno zephrojekthi yakho.

footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Unolwazi
chatbot.response: Ngilapha ukusiza! Ukuthola iseluleko se-OHS esenzelwe wena, sicela uthintane nochwepheshe.
construction.title: Ezempilo Nokuphepha Kwezokwakha
construction.description: Qinisekisa ukuthotshelwa kwemithetho yezempilo nokuphepha kwezokwakha usebenzisa Amathuluzi we-OHS we-SafetyHelp. Izinto zethu zokusebenzisa zikusiza ukuphatha iingozi, ukuthobela iimfuneko zomthetho, nokuvikela abasebenzi esizeni, ngokuthatha emikhubeni emihle echazwe ku-'Ukuphepha Kuqala: Izinto Ezibalulekileko Zamahlelo we-OHS.'
legal_appointments.title: Ukuqatjhwa Okusemthethweni
legal_appointments.description: Phatha ukuqatjhwa okusemthethweni kwezempilo nokuphepha emsebenzini njengoba kudingwa yimithetho ye-OHS yeSewula Afrika. Sebenzisa i-organogram ukwabela imisebenzi, ukufaka imininingwane yabaqatjhiweko, nokukhiqiza idokhumenti epheleleko enamaleta wokuqatjhwa, amarekhodi wokufundiswa, nokhunye.
organogram.title: I-Organogram Yokuqatjhwa Okusemthethweni kwe-OHS
organogram.form.name: Ibizo Lomqatjhiwa
legislation.title: Umthetho
legislation.description: Fikelela ilabhulali epheleleko yomthetho we-OHS, amazinga, nezibuyekezo. Khiqiza amarejista omthetho we-OHS, funa imithetho ethile, bese uhlola ubudlelwano phakathi kwemithetho. Ihlathululo ezenziwe lula ziyatholakala ukuze zithengwe ukwenza imibhalo yomthetho eyinkimbinkimbi ifikeleleke kalula.
legislation.tools.title: Amathuluzi Womthetho
legislation.updates.title: Izibuyekezo Zomthetho Nemibhalo Yomthetho Esalindileko
legislation.standards.title: Amazinga we-OHS
services.title: Imisebenzi Ye-SafetyHelp
services.description: Thola uhlu lwemisebenzi yezempilo nokuphepha emsebenzini eyenzelwe ukusekela iindawo zokusebenzela, izikolo, amakereke, nemikhakha engakahleleki kiyo yoke iSewula Afrika. Kusukela ekubonisaneni ukuya ekufundiseni, i-SafetyHelp inikela ngeensombululo ezenzelwe ukuhlangabezana neemfuno zokuthotshelwa nokuphepha.
services.consulting.title: Ukubonisana Nge-OHS
services.consulting.description: Thola iseluleko sobuchwepheshe ngokuthotshelwa kwe-OHS, ukuphathwa kwengozi, nokuqatjhwa okusemthethweni kubachwepheshe bethu abagunyaziweko. Sisebenze neenhlanganisela ezifana ne-Anglo Platinum, i-ABSA, ne-Metrorail ukunikela ngeensombululo ezenzelwe bona.
services.training.title: Amahlelo Wokufundiswa
services.training.description: Fikelela amahlelo wokufundiswa apheleleko yayo yoke imikhakha, kufaka hlangana ezokwakha, ukukhiqiza, nemfundo. Khetha ekufundisweni kokuthoma, amakhosi akhethekileko ngemisebenzi, nokhunye, koke okuhambisana nemithetho ye-OHS yeSewula Afrika.
services.audits.title: Ukuhlolwa Nokutlolwa Kwamabhuku
services.audits.description: Qinisekisa bona indawo yakho yokusebenzela ihlangabezana namazinga we-OHS ngemisebenzi yethu yokuhlola nokutlola amabhuku. Amathuluzi wethu akusiza ukwenza ukuhlola okupheleleko, ukukhiqiza imibiko, nokusebenzisa izenzo zokulungisa.
services.risk_management.title: Amahlelo Wokuphatha Ingozi
services.risk_management.description: Khiqiza amahlelo wokuphatha ingozi (ama-RMP) enzelwe wena ahlanganisa umthetho weSewula Afrika, imithetho kamasipaladi, namazinga wephasi loke njenge-ISO 45001, uqinisekise bona ibhizinisi lakho lilungele nanyana ngiyiphi ingozi.
services.support.title: Usekelo Namathuluzi Womphakathi
services.support.description: Joyina umphakathi wethu ukubika izigameko, ukufikelela amakhadi wokuhlola ukuphepha weenqolobane, izikolo, namathaveni, bese uthintana nabanye abachwepheshe be-OHS ukuthola usekelo nokubambisana.
training.title: Ukufundiswa Okupheleleko Endaweni Yokusebenzela
training.description: Hlola amahlelo wethu wokufundiswa okupheleleko endaweni yokusebenzela ukuqinisekisa ukuthotshelwa kwemithetho ye-OHS yeSewula Afrika nokukhuthaza indawo yokusebenzela ephephileko. Khetha ukufundiswa okwenziwako, ukufundiswa kweqembu, namkha usebenzise i-wizard yethu ukuthola iincomo ezenzelwe wena ngokusekelwe emkhakheni wakho, isiqhema esiqothelweko, nendawo.
training.wizard.start: Sicela ukhethe okunye ukuqala inqubo yokuncoma ukufundiswa.

training.wizard.step_2.error: Sicela ukhethe okungenani isiqhema esisodwa esiqothelweko.
training.wizard.step_2.option_emergency_: Iqembu Lesimo Esibucayi (Abaluleki Bokuqala, Abacimi Bomlilo)

training.wizard.step_5.description: Ngokusekelwe kokufakileko, nanki amahlelo wokufundiswa anconyiweko. Khetha lawo ofuna ukuwafaka kubhaskiti lakho.

training.cart.training_type.label: Khetha Indlela Yokwethula:
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Isitatimende Sokuzilandulela Se-SafetyHelp: Izinto zokufundiswa ezinikelweko ngezelwazi kwaphela begodu azisilo iseluleko sobuchwepheshe. Ukuthola iinsombululo ze-OHS ezenzelwe wena, thintana ne-SafetyHelp ku-support@safetyhelp.co.za namkha vakatshela Ikhasi Lokuthintana Nathi.
training.checkout.success: Ukukhokha kuphumelele! Izinto zakho zokufundiswa zikhiqiziwe. Dawuniloda ama-PDF wakho ngenzasi. Ukufundiswa ku-inthanethi, amakhodi wokufikelela athunyelwe kuwe nge-imeyili.
training.providers.title: Abanikeli Bokufundiswa Abagunyaziweko
training.providers.description: Udinga ukufundiswa mathupha? Thintana nabanikeli bokufundiswa abagunyaziweko ngeemfuno zakho.
training.providers.provider_1: I-ABC Training Solutions - Igunyazwe yi-SETA - Igxile Ekululekeni Kokuqala, Ukucima Umlilo - Thintana: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: I-SafeSkills Academy - Irejistwe ne-SACPCMP - Igxile Ekuphepheni Kwezokwakha - Thintana: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: Ukufundiswa Kwe-SafetyHelp - Ukufundiswa Okupheleleko Kwe-OHS - Thintana: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga Imanuwali Yokufundiswa Engenziwa Ngokwakho
training.manual.purchase.description: Thola imanuwali yokufundiswa epheleleko eyenzelwe ikhamphani yakho, kufaka hlangana iimfuneko zomthetho, okuqukethwe okukhethekileko ngekhamphani ngokusekelwe ephrofayilini yakho yengozi, namakhotheyitjhini avela kubanikeli bokufundiswa abagunyaziweko.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Cacisa Iphrofayili Yengozi Yemanuwali Yakho Yokufundiswa
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Iphrofayili Yengozi:
training.selection_method.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho Yokufundiswa
training.legal_fact.step_1: IQiniso Lomthetho: Isigaba 8 Somthetho we-OHS sidinga bona abaqatjhi banikele ngokufundiswa okwenzelwe iingozi ezithile zendawo yokusebenzela.
training.fun_fact.step_2: IQiniso Elihlekisako: Bewazi bona ukufundiswa okwenzeka qobe kunganciphisa izigameko endaweni yokusebenzela nge-30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: IQiniso Lomthetho: Abomasipaladi bendawo bangaba nemithetho ye-OHS ehlukileko ethinta iimfuneko zokufundiswa.
training.fun_fact.step_4: IQiniso Elihlekisako: Iindawo zokusebenzela ezinengozi ephezulu njengeensiza zokwakha zidinga ukufundiswa kanengi ukugcina amazinga wokuphepha.
training.legal_fact.step_5: IQiniso Lomthetho: Umthetho we-OHS ubeka ukufundiswa okukhethekileko ngeendima ezifana nabajameli be-SHE ukuqinisekisa ukuthotshelwa.

legislation.cart.description: I-RMP yakho ikhiqiziwe! Sebenzisa ikhowudi yevawutjha FREERMP2025 ukudawuniloda mahala (abasebenzisi bokuqala abayi-100).
suppliers.title: Isikhwama Sabathengisi be-OHS
suppliers.description: Fumana bese ulinganisa abathengisi be-OHS eSewula Afrika. Hlola ngendawo, imisebenzi, namagunya. Thumela ukubuyekezwa ukusiza abanye benze iinqumo ezinolwazi.

community_tools.title: Amathuluzi Wokuphepha Komphakathi
community_tools.description: Bika nanyana ngisiphi isigameko sokuphepha namkha ingozi emphakathini wakho namkha endaweni yokusebenzela, kusukela emigodini ukuya ezintweni zokusebenza ezingalungile. Sebenzisa amathuluzi wethu ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha eendaweni ezifana neenqolobane, izikolo, iimpatalela, namathaveni.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Bika Isigameko Namkha Ingozi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Hlathulula isigameko namkha ingozi (isb. umgodi Emgwaqweni Omkhulu, isitulo esiphukileko esikhungweni somphakathi)...

community_tools.incident_report.provider: Faka ifunjathwako namkha i-imeyili (kuzokufakwa ngokuzenzakalelako uma umhlinzeki ekhethiwe)...

community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Ikhadi Lokuhlola le-OHS Lesitolo Esincani
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Qinisekisa bona isitolo sakho esincani sihlangabezana neemfuneko zokuphepha komlilo, ugesi, nesakhiwo ngokwemithetho kamasipaladi Nomthetho we-OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Isiqondiso Sokuphepha Komlilo Esikolweni
community_tools.list.school.description: Funda ngeemfuneko zomthetho zokuphepha komlilo ezikolweni, kufaka hlangana amahlelo wokubaleka nezinto zokusebenza.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Isiqondiso Sokulungela Isimo Esibucayi Esibhedlela
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Qinisekisa bona iimpatalela zilungiselele izimo ezibucayi ngamahlelo wokubaleka afaneleko nezinto zokuphepha.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Ikhadi Lokuhlola Lokuphepha Ethaveni
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlola bona amathaveni athobela imithetho yokuphepha komlilo nokuphathwa kwesiqubuthu sabantu ukuvimbela izigameko.
dashboard.title: Ideshibhodi Yelunga
dashboard.welcome: Siyakwemukela, [Ibizo Lomsebenzisi]! Phatha ukuthotshelwa kwakho kwe-OHS, ama-RMP, ukubuyekezwa kwabathengisi, nemibiko yomphakathi lapha.

document_categories.title: Hlanganisa Amadokhumenti Wakho Wehlelo Lokuphatha i-OHS
document_categories.description: Khetha bese uhlanganisa amadokhumenti owadingako ngehlelo lakho lokuphatha i-OHS. Khetha emagomeni, iinkambisweni, amazingeni, nokhunye, okwenzelwe iimfuno zehlanganisela yakho.
document_categories.policies.title: Amagomo
document_categories.policies.description: Izitatimende ezisezingeni eliphezulu zehloso nokuzibophelela, ezigunyazwe ngabaphathi abaphezulu.
document_categories.policies.infectious_: Igomo Lokuphendula nge-COVID-19 namkha Isifo Esitjhelelako
document_categories.procedures.title: Iinkambiso
document_categories.procedures.descripti: Iinqondiso zesinyathelo ngesinyathelo zokwenza imisebenzi ngokuphepha nangokufana.
document_categories.procedures.first_aid: Inkambiso Yokululeka Kokuqala Nesimo Esibucayi Sezempilo
document_categories.standards.title: Amazinga/Iinqondiso
document_categories.standards.descriptio: Amabhentjhimakhi wangaphakathi ahambisana nomthetho namkha amazinga womkhakha, achaza iimeko namkha ukuziphatha okulindelekileko.
document_categories.standards.hygiene_fa: Izinga Leendawo Zokuhlwanzeka (iindlwana zangasese, amanzi, iindawo zokuphumula)
document_categories.registers_logs.title: Amarejista Namalogbuku
document_categories.registers_logs.descr: Amarekhodi ahlala abuyekezwa ukwenzela ukulandelela nokutholwa.
document_categories.templates_forms.desc: Amadokhumenti ahleliweko ngaphambili ukubuthelela nokwenza kufane okufakwako.
document_categories.templates_forms.haza: Ikhadi Lombiko Wengozi / Iforomo Yengozi Ecishe Yenzeke
